message: Let's start fair, Bob. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can adjust later if you want.
Alice, that's a tough start. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor this round.  Let's make a deal and avoid the inflation trap!
Bob, I'm willing to split the money evenly this time. Inflation is starting to hit hard, so let's both get something decent while we can.
